Title: Prohibits the department of environmental conservation from issuing or authorizing any permits to new or expanding large concentrated animal feeding operations
Summary: Prohibits the department of environmental conservation from issuing or authorizing any permits to new or expanding large concentrated animal feeding operations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the department of environmental conservation from issuing or authorizing any permits to new or expanding large concentrated animal feeding operations
